channel.title: Changing Lunar Altar [562]
channel.description:
I have altar 17010 for lunar changing and its a giant circle runecraft altar. I want it to be a smaller rectangle altar 13197. How can i change so 13197 gives u lunar magic and not 17010. Im using 562 Painzone base. (credits to painzone) I just need to know what folder.
Thanks :P
